## NFTCollection.balance() method

Get the NFT balance of the connected wallet

**Signature:**

```typescript
balance(mintAddress: string): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mintAddress | string |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

the NFT balance

## Example


```jsx
const balance = await program.balance();
```
